title: 指定世界权限设置
author: NikolaTesla
txt_content: 指定世界禁止/home，禁止放置，禁止/sethome，禁止传送，等。

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
可以使用worldguard插件实现，可以在指定世界输入下面的指令
禁止放置:rg flag __global__ build deny(禁止全世界建筑)
             rg flag __global__ blocked-cmds home,sethome,tpa,tp(禁止该世界home,sethome,tp和tpa指令的使用)
如果禁止传送不是想禁止传送指令而是不让别的玩家传送到指定世界里可以使用插件或者ess的配置文件设置

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
需要分开世界权限组。弄起来比较复杂
  mirrors:
        # Worlds listed here have their settings mirrored in their children.
        # The first element 'world' is the main worlds name, and is the parent world.
        # subsequent elements 'world_nether' and 'world_the_end' are worlds which will use
        # the same user/groups files as the parent.
        # the element 'all_unnamed_worlds' specifies all worlds that aren't listed, and automatically mirrors them to it's parent.
        # Each child world can be configured to mirror the 'groups', 'users' or both files from its parent.
        world:
          world_nether:
          - users
          - groups
          world_the_end:
          - users
          - groups
          all_unnamed_worlds:
          - users
          - groups复制代码
在config里设置每个世界读取的用户文件和组文件。
